posts._title: Frantisek Vlácil – Stín kapradiny AKA The Shadow of the Ferns (1986)
posts.title: Stín kapradiny
posts.excerpt: SynopsisSomewhat reminiscent of Fassbinder, in particular QUERELLE, with characters appearing as the Angels of Death, this film could be titled HANSEL AND HANSEL. The story comes from the novel by Josef Capek, and is one of Vlacil’s wordiest, more philosophical films, as two young men are caught in the woods by the gameskeeper killing a …

posts._title: Henrik Malyan – Nahapet AKA Life Triumphs (1977)
posts.title: Nahapet
posts.excerpt: Story of a strong-willed man, Nahapet, who lost his family during the 1915 Genocide! is an eternal story of resurrection. From imdbStorylineNahapet (meaning also patriarch in Armenian) has lost all his family and intimates, his house and properties during the 1915 Genocide. Self-absorbed and reticent, he reminds a withered tree. Same is with the village …

posts.title: Simon Judit
posts.excerpt: Judit kills her first child because the father left them. She returns to a previous suitor, Simon. Each year their child dies. The rabbi says this happens because she killed her first child and forbids her to kiss her baby till it gets married.

posts._title: Jean Painlevé – Science is Fiction: 23 Films by Jean Painlevé (2009) (DVD)
posts.title: Science is Fiction: 23 Films by Jean Painlevé (2009) (DVD)
posts.excerpt: The mesmerizing, utterly unclassifiable science films of Jean Painlevé (1902-89) must be seen to be believed: delightful, surrealist-influenced dream works that are also serious science. The French filmmaker-scientist-inventor had a decades-spanning career in which he created hundreds of short films on subjects ranging from astronomy to pigeons to, most famously, such marine-life marvels as the …

posts._title: Roberto Roberti – L’ultima vittima AKA A Victim of Vengeance (1913)
posts.title: L’ultima vittima
posts.excerpt: A VICTIM OF VENGEANCE Original lenght: 852 m Emma Vallona, an oriental dancer, is suffocated by debts due to her expensive life; so she does not hesitate to induce the Minister d’Angy to endorse a bill in her favour. While the Minister is gradually being overwhelmed by this scandal, which contributes to destroy his political …

posts._title: Rolf Olsen & Lee Payant – Blutiger Freitag AKA Bloody Friday [Uncut] (1972)
posts.title: Blutiger Freitag
posts.excerpt: Synopsis:After escaping from a courtroom during his trial, a criminal plans the biggest bank robbery every to have taken place in Germany.

posts.title: Jackpot 2
posts.excerpt: Quote:Three young people, two boys and a girl, meet on a Friday evening in an urban post-disaster setting which has brought Helsinki to ruins. The boys’ sole purpose of life is to play a Flip-Flop pinball machine.

posts.title: Gala
posts.excerpt: Quote:A night in a club. The magic of little things happening and ‘dishappening’ with some kind of ironic tenderness

posts._title: Dmytro Kolomoytsev & Anatoliy Lavrenishyn – Ukrayinska literatura AKA Ukrainian Literature: Guide for Assholes (2009)
posts.title: Ukrayinska literatura
posts.excerpt: It was a common habit in Soviet schools to draw the intimate organs on all portraits in textbooks.

posts._title: Wisit Sasanatieng – Fah talai jone AKA Tears of the Black Tiger [Director’s cut] (2000)
posts.title: Fah talai jone
posts.excerpt: Synopsis:In the countryside of Thailand, a gang of outlaws makes the region unsafe. Among them is the handsome gun hero Dum, who became unwillingly involved in the bandit life. Handsome Dum made a promise to his upper-crust lover Rumpoey: despite the class difference, they will get married. When the moment of reunion arrives, Dum gets …
